DOC.brief_title: Accessory Joint Neural Mobilizations Shoulder After Breast Cancer Surgery . Randomized Clinical Trial .
DOC.detailed_description: Background : The potential consequence breast cancer surgery joint pain sensitive disorder , main sign alteration shoulder mobility . Design : Prospective randomize double-blind pilot trial . Objective : To pilot effectiveness accessory joint nerve mobilization technique order get overview joint capsule nerve involvement shoulder motion restriction . Participants : 18 woman undergo unilateral breast cancer surgery axillary lymph node dissection . Setting : WomenÂ´s Health Research Group Physical Therapy Department University Alcala , Madrid , Spain . Intervention : accessory joint mobilization versus neural mobilization . Follow-up : Six-month follow-up . Key outcome : Range motion , sensitive disorder , pain upper limb functionality .
